title: Intuitive Machines’ CEO points to issues that prevented upright touchdown during IM-2 Moon landing
summary: Steve Altemus, Intuitive Machines’ CEO, said the company is applying the learnings to the IM-3 mission, which is set to launch in the first half of 2026.

title: Eutelsat plots digital upgrades for follow-on OneWeb satellites
summary:
Space computing specialist Ramon.Space announced a deal to supply digital communication channelizer systems for at least 70 upcoming OneWeb satellites, helping transition the constellation to a software-defined network that can be updated in orbit.

title: European banks help OroraTech raise more funds for wildfire-monitoring constellation
summary:
OroraTech has secured an extra $13 million in Series B venture funding to accelerate the expansion of its wildfire-monitoring constellation, the German satellite operator announced May 14.
